name: Rumblefish
tag_list: music, microsync, licensing, sync, media, youtube
overview: Rumblefish is the largest provider of soundtracks for social video and has been a pioneer in the music licensing industry for over a decade. Through its API, SDK and Storefront offerings, the platform allows partners to offer soundtrack functionality for web, mobile and desktop applications, and provide access to the world’s largest copyright-cleared soundtrack catalog of over two million tracks. The company makes soundtracks for online social videos easy and legal, and has issued more than nine million licenses, many through its popular soundtrack storefront Friendly Music, paying millions in royalties to its artists. Rumblefish partners include YouTube, HighlightCam, Socialcam,Amazon, Klip and Google. The company can be found at www.rumblefish.com and is headquartered in Portland, OR with offices in Los Angeles and San Francisco.

acquisitions.source_description: Rumblefish, Soundtrack Licensing Partner To YouTube And Others, Buys Catalogik To Improve Music Search

milestones.description: Launched Friendly Music in partnership with YouTube.  $1.99 songs for YouTube videos.  Legal music to use for your YouTube video soundtracks that is "video editor-friendly" and guaranteed to not to get your UGC video blocked or muted
